SYSTEM: EN_terminology_in_ontologies%2817-03-09%29.pdf: Página 58
58
Ontologies in the terminological field
• Technologies that allow:
– Acquiring and modelling knowledge
– Browsing and recovering information
– Representing and visualizing information
– Interpreting and sharing knowledge
• Systems that include semantics and context by means of
ontologies and textual corpora (Termontography)
• Current
tools
make
interoperability
and
semantic
web
applications easier
speaker: SYSTEM
